name: Trust
description: Trust means the area is calm and is surrounded by calm or trusted neighbors.

name: Calm
description: Calm means there is no reported suspicious activity in the area, or the area has been verified by a counter-intelligence sweep.

name: Suspicion
description: Suspicion means there is reported suspicious activity in the area.

name: Alarm
description: Alarm means the area is in danger.

name: Violence
description: Violence means the area is in immediate danger or has enemy units nearby.
